name: mysam-ui
description: A MySam web frontend for mysam-core built with React

scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:pre: npm run add-dist && npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre
scripts.release:patch: npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.test: npm run browserify && npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.browserify:min: browserify lib/index.js -t babelify --standalone mysam.ui | uglifyjs > dist/mysam-ui.min.js
scripts.browserify: npm run clean && npm run browserify:dist && npm run browserify:min
scripts.add-dist: npm run browserify && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run styles
